979730.name: Tin Hearts Act 1 - Original Soundtrack
979730.description:
"My hope is that the music compliments these ideas and immerses the player in this world, guiding them as they explore the puzzles, mysteries and uncover the emotional narrative." - Matt Chastney, Tin Hearts Composer

Music by Matthew Chastney
Produced and mixed by Matthew Chastney
Mastered by John Webber at Air Studios
Cover design by Daniel Jimenez

Matthew Chastney – Electronics, Guitars, Keyboards, Piano
Richard Curran – Violin, Viola, Cello
Jordi Francis – Harp
Laura Intravia – Flute, Alto Flute
Kristin Naigus – Bass Flute, English Horn, Oboe
979730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
